snippet: At the Second World Mind Sports Games at the Lille, France, all three United States teams qualified for the round of 16.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on a deal played by the United States women’s team at the Second World Mind Sports Games in Lille, France.
lead_paragraph: At the Second World Mind Sports Games at the Lille, France, all three United States teams qualified for the round of 16.

headline.seo: Bridge Play at the Second World Mind Sports Games
